dhp221:3: Not adhering to mind and body,
dhp221:4: possessing nothing, one does not fall into suffering.
dhp222:2: one who stops it like a runaway cart -
dhp222:3: That is the one I call a charioteer;
dhp222:4: other people just hold the reins.
dhp223:1: By means of non-anger one defeats anger,
dhp223:2: by means of excellence one defeats non-excellence,
dhp223:3: by means of generosity one defeats stinginess,
dhp223:4: by means of truth one defeats lies.
dhp224:1: Speak the truth, do not get angry,
dhp224:2: and give - even just a little bit - when asked;
dhp224:3: by means of these three things
dhp224:4: you will enter the presence of the angels.
dhp227:1: This is an incomparably ancient truth,
dhp227:2: not just the way it is today:
dhp227:3: they criticize those who are silent,
dhp227:4: they criticize those who speak a lot,
dhp227:5: they criticize those who speak moderately;
dhp227:6: there is no one in the world who is not criticized.
dhp228:1: It has not been, it will not be,
dhp228:2: and it is not now the case
dhp229:3: is known to have impeccable conduct, intelligence,
dhp230:1: Such a person is like a gold coin -
dhp230:2: who would be worthy to criticize them?
dhp230:3: Even the angels praise such a person;

dhp231:1: Protect yourself from manifesting anger physically;
dhp231:4: practice good conduct with the body.

dhp233:1: Protect yourself from manifesting anger mentally;
